ModMetaData.name: Corruption - Worship
ModMetaData.author: Cpt. Ohu
ModMetaData.description:
A Warhammer 40k conversion mod. This module contains everything to start your own little religious community.
Team: Cpt.Ohu - Assembly, XML, Textures TrashMan - Textures, XML BanditPanda/Baron - Textures KriegsStrudel - Textures StoneWolf - Assembly, XML Imperitor - Assembly, XML InfinityKage - Concept/Balancing
